scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.backend:lint: cd backend && poetry run black app/ && poetry run isort app/
scripts.backend:migrate: cd backend && poetry run alembic upgrade head
scripts.backend:migrate:create: cd backend && poetry run alembic revision --autogenerate -m
scripts.lint: npm run frontend:lint && npm run backend:lint
scripts.format: npm run frontend:format && npm run backend:lint
